text:
KTMA is such an amazing Taekwondo school! The instructors are friendly, skilled, and really care about helping everyone improve. The classes are fun, challenging, and a great way to stay fit while learning valuable skills.

What I love most is how they focus on building confidence and discipline, not just the physical side of Taekwondo. Whether you’re a beginner or have experience, you’ll feel right at home here. Highly recommend KTMA to anyone thinking about joining!

My two daughters absolutely loved their trial lesson at KTMA! The instructors were so patient and engaging, making the class fun and exciting for them. They couldn’t stop talking about everything they learned, and it was clear how much they enjoyed it.

It’s not just about learning martial arts it’s about becoming more confident and resilient. I’ve seen so much growth in myself since joining, and I’d recommend KTMA to anyone looking for a great Taekwondo school!
Best taekwondo school in Singapore! Professional instructors and friendly managers! Highly recommended!
This course is very good. It can exercise children's self-Defence training, but my child sprained his ankle during the training, which is dangerous.
